Articles.Content: Hello. have installed many mods today thru CKAN and when i started the save file my sky was black like it was night https://imgur.com/a/xHGI79g. I have astronomers visuals pack and some other visual mods. If you want ill give you my list of mods. It has to be by one of my mods i know because when i started this ave without them the sky was normal like it should. Anyways hope any of you will respond. Regardless thanks for any responses.
Looks like a scatterer issue to me. Try reinstalling scatterer, or if that doesn’t work reinstall all your graphics mods.
